sentences.sContent: Founded in 1935 in Ohio, Alcoholics Anonymous is now a world-wide organization.
sentences.sCn: 嗜酒者互诫协会1935年创立于俄亥俄州，现在是一个世界性的组织。

sentences.sContent: Eton College was founded by Henry VI in 1440.
sentences.sCn: 伊顿公学于1440年由亨利六世创办。
